name: SidebarJS
tagline: add sidebar navigation menu to web page
body:
sidebarJS ----------------- Add sidebar navigation to your website easily. Works great on mobile sites. **And you can customize the style with sass functions.** [View Demo](http://gallery.hudidit.com/huyueFramework/sidebarJS/) -------------- How to use --------------- ```html

Home About Contact
``` ``can be put anywhere inside the ``. It's centered vertically relative to its parent. Watch Out! --------------- - ``is needed. - Class names must be exactly the same as above. - `
...
`is recommended to be written after other contents of the document, otherwise [FOUC](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Flash_of_unstyled_content) might happen. - `
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
